channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dangerous pothole that broke my bicycle wheel, 22nd January
item.description:
Side of road, opposite Troughton Farm

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole with water, 22nd January
item.description:
The road outside the house has sunk and is collecting water. Cars going pass are driving through it drenching pedistrians. This is a regular occurance due to numerous botch repairs. Elderley around area too scared to walk that way.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Priors Road, Whaddon, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Moorend rd charlton kings zebra crossing beacons are out, 22nd January
item.description:
The beacons have been out since work done by entrance to pinetrees
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Pinetrees, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fallen tree outside 5 Clarence Square blocking pavement, having to walk in the road., 22nd January
item.description:
Tree fell on 20 Sept 2024, I'm having to walk in road to get by, muddy verge too slippy, clearly dangerous and lack of action over past 4 months grossly neglient, any harm will involve punitive damages, suggest this is now dealt with as a priority. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Clarence Square, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Tree causing damage/obstruction to pavement or road

item.title: Street light is out, 22nd January
item.description:
The street light next to the bus stop near KFC is out.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole in road, surface collapsed & Barriers to collect, 22nd January
item.description:
This pothole near the entrance of the cut de sac section of Malden Road has had red barriers around it for about 2 or 3 months but has yet to be repaired. Yet it seems as though the report has been taken off this site? Also - outside 83 Malden Road there are 4 large red barriers that have been left there for over 2 months following a separate pothole repair - it looks like they have been forgotten - can they be picked up please?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 70, Malden Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 22nd January
item.description:
Some guttering has been dumped near the waste bin. It has been there for a few months.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aggs Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 22nd January
item.description:
